jobDescription: Designed and enhanced application pages in Power Apps, improving functionality, and user experience.
Automated data entry by developing a Microsoft workflow to extract key variables from JSON emails and insert them into a relational database.
Optimized data extraction solutions to enhance the accuracy of on-time performance metrics for a visualization dashboard.
Developed Azure DevOps pipelines to test Terraform code for AML module.
Managed Azure resource groups and provided feedback for infrastructure improvements.
Participated in Agile ceremonies including daily Scrums, sprint reviews, and backlog grooming to support collaborative development.
Developed a REST API to interface with Oracle SQL and MongoDB databases.
Implemented back-end functionality to query Oracle databases and synchronize data with MongoDB.
Tested API endpoints using Postman to ensure reliable data transfer.
Improved Python script to generate Excel tables and schematics detailing aircraft body components.
Gained experience with CMake for building and managing project configurations.
